meta.name: Profile Tweaks
meta.tagline: Enhance user profiles with extra customization.
meta.description: A set of toggleable tweaks for profiles - each aiming to restore old functionality or improve UX for powerusers.

fullBioToggle.description: Toggle full display of the bio instead of just opening the full profile.

expandBioByDefault.description: Default to full display of the bio.

defaultToMainProfile.description: Instead of defaulting to showing the server profile in the profile dialog, default to the main profile.

detailedJoinDates.displayName: Show detailed join dates on hover
